NAVIGATION.text: PB L1 will show currently selected WP. You can easily delete the current selected WP by pressing DEL (PB L4)

NAVIGATION.action: Select EDIT or ADD as required

NAVIGATION.text: You can see current available WP list by pressing COORD (PB T5) followed by WPTHZ (PB T1)
You can review WP information in the same page selecting the WP right row (PB R1-6)
You can set the WP as aquisition by pressing in the same page selecting the WP left row (PB L1-6). Aquisition wil be shown on PB R6 in main page
You can review abbreviation codes by pressing POINT (PB B6) followed by ABR (PB T4)
You can also slew over already existing WP directly in the map using the cyclic cursor
